responses: Hello! Welcome to Eshopy. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! Looking for something specific on Eshopy?
Greetings! How can I help you with your shopping needs?

patterns: What can I buy on Eshopy?
What kind of electronics do you have?
responses:
Eshopy offers a wide range of categories, including:
1. Electronics (phones, laptops, smartwatches)
2. Fashion (clothing, accessories, shoes)
3. Home Essentials (furniture, kitchenware, decor)
4. Beauty & Health (makeup, skincare, vitamins)
5. Groceries (fresh food, snacks, beverages)
6. Sports & Outdoor (gym equipment, sportswear)
7. Toys & Baby Products

Let me know what you’re looking for!

patterns: Are these shoes available in size 10?
responses: You can check the availability of products on the Eshopy app by visiting the product page. Would you like me to search for a specific product?

patterns: What is the price of this item?
Is there a discount on this item?
responses: Prices vary based on product and offers. You can find the latest prices on the product page in the Eshopy app.

patterns: How can I track my order?
responses: You can track your order in the 'My Orders' section of the Eshopy app. Do you want me to guide you through it?

patterns: How do I cancel my order?
I want to cancel my order
responses: You can cancel an order before it is shipped in the 'My Orders' section. If it's already shipped, please contact customer support for assistance.

patterns: I want to modify my order
How do I change the delivery address?
Can I add another item to my order?
responses: Modifications can be made before shipping. Go to 'My Orders' in the Eshopy app and select the order to modify. If already shipped, contact support.

patterns: Can I pay with a credit card?
How can I pay for my order?
responses:
Eshopy accepts:
- Credit/Debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express)
- PayPal
- Cash on delivery (in selected regions)
- E-wallets (Google Pay, Apple Pay)

patterns: How do I return an item?
How long do I have to return an order?
responses: Eshopy allows returns within 14 days of delivery. The item must be unused and in original packaging. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

patterns: How long does a refund take?
I returned an item, when will I get my money back?
responses: Refunds typically take 5-7 business days to process. You can check the status in the 'My Orders' section of the app.
Standard delivery takes 3-7 days. Express delivery options are available at an additional cost. Free shipping is available on orders above a certain amount.

patterns: How do I create an account?
How can I reset my password?
How do I update my profile?
responses: You can sign up using your email or social media. To reset your password, go to 'Forgot Password' on the login page.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?
I need help with my order
responses: You can contact Eshopy support via the 'Help Center' in the app or through live chat. Support is available 24/7.

patterns: How can I get a discount?
responses: Yes! Check the 'Deals' section in the Eshopy app for ongoing discounts and promotions.

patterns: How do I add items to my wishlist?
Can I save products for later?
responses: Tap the '❤️' icon on any product to add it to your wishlist. You can access your saved items in the 'Wishlist' section of your account.

patterns: How do I view my cart?
How can I remove items from my cart?
Can I edit my cart before checkout?
responses: You can view and manage your cart by tapping the 'Cart' icon in the app. You can add, remove, or update items before proceeding to checkout.

patterns: Do you have a loyalty program?
Can I redeem points for discounts?
responses: Eshopy has a rewards program where you earn points for purchases. Points can be redeemed for discounts and exclusive offers.

patterns: Where can I see product reviews?
How do I read customer feedback?
responses: Yes! You can read and write reviews under each product page in the Eshopy app.
You're welcome! Happy shopping on Eshopy!
Glad to assist you! Let me know if you need more help.
Anytime! Enjoy your shopping.
Goodbye! Have a great day shopping on Eshopy!
See you soon!
Come back anytime for great deals.
